movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: Un hacker découvre la vérité sur sa réalité et son rôle dans la guerre contre ses contrôleurs.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: Un voleur spécialisé dans l'extraction d'informations prend part à une mission d'«inception».

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: Un groupe d'explorateurs voyage à travers un trou de ver à la recherche d'un nouvel habitat pour l'humanité.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: En 2049, un nouveau Blade Runner déterre un secret susceptible de plonger ce qu'il reste de la société dans le chaos.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: L'histoire de J. Robert Oppenheimer, le physicien qui a dirigé le Projet Manhattan pour développer la première bombe atomique.

movies.title: Barbie
movies.description: Barbie, qui vit dans le monde parfait de Barbieland, part à la découverte du monde réel.

movies.title: Poor Things
movies.description: L'histoire de Bella Baxter, une jeune femme ramenée à la vie par un scientifique brillant mais non conventionnel.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society.
Two soldiers are assigned to deliver a message that will stop a deadly attack.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
movies.description: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age.

movies.title: The Irishman
movies.description: A mob hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.

movies.title: Tenet
movies.description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the world, a protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage.

movies.title: Soul
movies.description: A musician who has lost his passion for music is transported out of his body and must find his way back.

movies.title: Nomadland
movies.description: A woman in her sixties who, after losing everything in the Great Recession, embarks on a journey through the American West.

movies.title: The Father
movies.description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help.

movies.title: The Power of the Dog
movies.description: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him.

movies.title: CODA
movies.description: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family.

movies.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies.description: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.description: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.description: When the Riddler, a sadistic serial killer, begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption.

movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora.

movies.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who led the Manhattan Project to develop the first atomic bomb.

movies.title: Carry-On
movies.description: Un agent de la TSA est pris dans un complot criminel lors d'un vol commercial la veille de Noël.

movies.title: Damsel
movies.description: Une jeune femme accepte d'épouser un beau prince, mais découvre qu'il s'agit en réalité d'un piège : elle doit être sacrifiée pour rembourser une dette ancestrale.

movies.title: The Union
movies.description: Une ancienne agente de la CIA est forcée de reprendre du service pour une dernière mission.

movies.title: Rebel Ridge
movies.description: Un vétéran du Sud des États-Unis affronte l'injustice systémique dans une histoire à haute tension.

movies.title: Lift
movies.description: Une équipe de voleurs internationaux tente de dérober 500 millions de dollars d'or dans un avion à 40 000 pieds d'altitude.

movies.title: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F
movies.description: Axel Foley revient à Beverly Hills pour enquêter sur la mort de son vieil ami et retrouver sa fille.

movies.title: A Family Affair
movies.description: Une histoire d'amour inattendue bouleverse une famille de manière surprenante et humoristique.

movies.title: Atlas
movies.description: Une brillante analyste de données doit affronter une IA qu'elle a créée pour empêcher une guerre catastrophique.

movies.title: Our Little Secret
movies.description: Un secret longtemps gardé menace de détruire la vie parfaite d'une famille.

movies.title: Trigger Warning
movies.description: Une ancienne Forces Spéciales hérite du bar de son grand-père et se retrouve confrontée à un gang criminel local.

series.title: The Last of Us
series.description: Dans un monde post-apocalyptique, un survivant endurci doit escorter une adolescente qui pourrait être le salut de l'humanité.

series.title: House of the Dragon
series.description: L'histoire de la famille Targaryen, 200 ans avant les événements de Game of Thrones.

series.title: The Queen's Gambit
series.description: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess.

series.title: The Mandalorian
series.description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

series.title: The Witcher
series.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

series.title: Bridgerton
series.description: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set in the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

series.title: The Crown
series.description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

series.title: The Boys
series.description: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

series.title: The Umbrella Academy
series.description: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.

series.title: Loki
series.description: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of Avengers: Endgame.

series.title: WandaVision
series.description: Blends the style of classic sitcoms with the MCU in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision - two super-powered beings living their ideal suburban lives - begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

series.title: Squid Game
series.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

series.title: Ted Lasso
series.description: Follows US American football coach Ted Lasso heading to the UK to manage a struggling London football team in the top flight of English football.

series.title: Succession
series.description: Follows the Roy family, known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world.

series.title: Euphoria
series.description: A look at life for a group of high school students as they grapple with issues of drugs, sex, and violence.

series.title: The Bear
series.description: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.

series.title: Severance
series.description: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives.

series.title: Wednesday
series.description: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability.

series.title: The Sandman
series.description: Upon escaping after decades of imprisonment by a mortal wizard, Dream, the personification of dreams, sets about to reclaim his lost equipment.

series.title: Un Jour
series.description: L'histoire de Dexter et Emma, qui se retrouvent chaque année le même jour pendant plusieurs décennies.

series.title: Ripley
series.description: Un escroc est embauché par un riche homme d'affaires pour convaincre son fils de revenir en Amérique.

series.title: SupraCell
series.description: Une unité d'élite de la police infiltre un réseau criminel sophistiqué.

series.title: Kaos
series.description: Une réinterprétation moderne et audacieuse de la mythologie grecque.

series.title: The Gentlemen
series.description: Un aristocrate hérite d'un domaine familial, découvrant qu'il fait partie d'un empire du cannabis.

series.title: Mon Petit Renne
series.description: Une histoire touchante sur la relation entre une jeune fille et un renne dans le Grand Nord.

series.title: Espion à l'Ancienne
series.description: Un ancien espion de la guerre froide sort de sa retraite pour une dernière mission.

series.title: Avatar: Le Dernier Maître de l'Air
series.description: L'adaptation en live-action de la série animée, suivant Aang, le dernier Avatar, dans sa quête pour maîtriser les quatre éléments.

series.title: Griselda
series.description: L'histoire vraie de Griselda Blanco, qui a créé l'un des cartels les plus rentables de l'histoire.

series.title: American Nightmare
series.description: Une nouvelle histoire dans l'univers de The Purge, explorant les conséquences d'une nuit où tous les crimes sont légaux.

series.title: Le Problème à 3 Corps
series.description: Des scientifiques font face à une menace extraterrestre qui remet en question les fondements de la science humaine.

series.title: Berlin
series.description: Un prequel de La Casa de Papel centré sur le personnage énigmatique de Berlin et ses braquages les plus audacieux.

comments.author: Alice
comments.text: Mon film préféré de Nolan, la scène du couloir est dingue !

comments.author: Sophie
comments.text: Une performance exceptionnelle de Cillian Murphy, le film est un chef-d'œuvre !

comments.author: Alice
comments.text: Un film surprenant et intelligent qui dépasse toutes les attentes !

about.description: EfreiFlix est la plateforme de streaming dédiée aux étudiants Efrei.
